name: gjsify
description: Combine the power of Typescript with the power of GJS

scripts.print:name: echo 'gjsify (root)'
scripts.build: yarn print:name && yarn print:yarn && yarn build:infra && yarn build:gjs && yarn build:other
scripts.build:infra: yarn workspace @gjsify/resolve-npm run build && yarn workspace @gjsify/esbuild-plugin-transform-ext run build && yarn workspace @gjsify/esbuild-plugin-deepkit run build && yarn workspace @gjsify/esbuild-plugin-deno-loader run build && yarn workspace @gjsify/esbuild-plugin-gjsify run build && yarn workspace @gjsify/cli run build || exit 0
scripts.build:gjs: yarn workspace @gjsify/webgl run build:meson && yarn workspace @gjsify/types run build && yarn workspace @gjsify/utils run build && yarn build:deno && yarn build:web && yarn workspace @gjsify/unit run build && yarn workspace @gjsify/gio-2.0 run build && yarn workspace @gjsify/soup-3.0 run build || exit 0
scripts.build:web: yarn workspace @gjsify/dom-events run build && yarn workspace @gjsify/html-image-element run build && yarn workspace @gjsify/webgl run build
scripts.build:deno: yarn workspace @gjsify/deno-runtime run build && yarn workspace @gjsify/deno_std && yarn workspace @gjsify/deno-globals run build

author: Pascal Garber <pascal@artandcode.studio>
